name: Noisy Mall
description:
For a better gaming experience, it is recommended to use earbuds, especially if they support space audio technology.

Noisy Mall is a stealth game in which you have to escape from a mall without being detected by the guard, taking advantage of the spatial audio of objects to orient yourself within the map.

For those who wish, a survey is available that would help us derive useful data for our study on the impact of sound effects on the player's emotional state and sense of direction.

Survey (ita)

Survey (eng)

Controls:

Mouse: camera

WASD: movement

Left-Shift: run
